projects.name: Black Jack
projects.desc: A Python-3 command-line blackjack game where players bet, make decisions, and compete against the computer using traditional rules.
Features: Enables bet placement and wager adjustments
Supports hit, stand, or double down options
Dealer adheres to traditional blackjack rules
Game concludes after busts or player stands

projects.name: Netflix Recap
projects.desc: A data analysis project analyzing Netflix watch history to provide insights like most watched series and viewing time.
Features: Analyzes Netflix watch history for insights
Displays most watched series and genres

projects.name: Sorting Visualizer
projects.desc: Visualizes sorting algorithms in real-time, enhancing understanding of bubble sort, quick sort, and merge sort.
Features: Customizable array size and visualization speed

projects.name: Top Crypto Finder
projects.desc: Uses web scraping to display the top 10 cryptocurrencies, including price and market capitalization data.
Features: Sorts coins by price, market cap, or volume

projects.name: Password Checker
projects.desc: Checks password security against known breached passwords and offers options for generating secure passwords.
Features: Provides breach severity and frequency info

projects.name: Typo Speed Checker
projects.desc: Measures typing speed by recording words per minute across different texts, displaying detailed results.
Features: Records words, time taken, and WPM score
Provides practice options to improve speed

projects.name: Clusters
projects.desc: A web socializing app for university students featuring chat rooms, video sharing, and an events page.

projects.name: Long Distance Room
projects.desc: Helps long-distance couples stay connected through chats, shared activities, and relationship tracking.
